title: Find Discussions Method Arguments
description: Arguments for the find_discussions method, designed to query a database of conversations based on various criteria, including categories. Synonyms for conversation are session, discussion, and chat.

title.description: Title for filtering discussions using a LIKE operator, which allows for partial matches. Distinct from category name. Might be referenced to by name or title.

starttime_start.description: Start of the start time range for filtering discussions, in ISO 8601 format.

endtime_start.description: End of the start time range for filtering discussions, in ISO 8601 format.

starttime_end.description: Start of the end time range for filtering discussions, in ISO 8601 format.

endtime_end.description: End of the end time range for filtering discussions, in ISO 8601 format.

category.description: Filter discussions by a specific category, including its name and score. Might be referenced by category name or tag. Distinct from discussion title.

score.description: Condition for filtering discussions by category score.

limit.description: Maximum number of discussions to return. Can be 10 at most.

offset_page.description: Paging offset to paginate the results.

order_by.description: Order the results by a specific field.
